alert.note: Alert for Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pratt County through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm very near Pratt, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Iuka around 525 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Preston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
